short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set a target date to see remaining days countdown. On Google Calendar, it's displayed on the left.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DaysCountDown is a browser extension designed to seamlessly integrate with Google Calendar. With a focus on simplicity and functionality, it allows users to set a target date and then prominently displays the remaining days leading up to that date directly within the Google Calendar interface.
